sys_hub_flow.name: Plant Maintenance Overdue Notification

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Sends email to string located in email column in my plants table. One email per overdue plant. - Sean Grube

sys_variable_value.value: Your plant is overdue for maintenance

sys_element_mapping.value:
Your 2 - For Each➛...➛Name may be overdue for watering or replacement of fertilizer!

It was last watered on 2 - For Each➛...➛Last Watered and was/is scheduled to be watered again on 2 - For Each➛...➛Next watering.

Its fertilizer was last replaced on 2 - For Each➛...➛Last Fertilized and was/is scheduled to be replaced on 2 - For Each➛...➛Next Fertilize

 

Don't forget to log if these events were completed. 

We are here to keep your plants safe and healthy!

Have a great day :)

sys_hub_flow_snapshot.name: Plant Maintenance Overdue Notification

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Sends email to string located in email column in my plants table. One email per overdue plant. - Sean Grube

sys_variable_value.value: Your plant is overdue for maintenance

sys_element_mapping.value:
Your 2 - For Each➛...➛Name may be overdue for watering or replacement of fertilizer!

It was last watered on 2 - For Each➛...➛Last Watered and was/is scheduled to be watered again on 2 - For Each➛...➛Next watering.

Its fertilizer was last replaced on 2 - For Each➛...➛Last Fertilized and was/is scheduled to be replaced on 2 - For Each➛...➛Next Fertilize

 

Don't forget to log if these events were completed. 

We are here to keep your plants safe and healthy!

Have a great day :)
